name: Chocolate Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake made with rich, dark chocolate and topped with a fluffy buttercream frosting.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: Freshly baked muffin filled with juicy blueberries and topped with a crumbly streusel topping.

name: Pecan Pie
description: Classic southern pie filled with a sweet, gooey mixture of pecans and corn syrup.

name: Banana Bread
description: Moist and flavorful bread made with ripe bananas, cinnamon, and vanilla.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
description: Light and fluffy cake layered with sweetened whipped cream and fresh strawberries.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic cookies made with butter, brown sugar, and lots of chocolate chips.
